name: Grandma Becky's Pasta Salad
author: dselgy
summary: Super easy dilly and cheesy pasta salad. Great at cookouts and potlucks.
ingredients: ½ cup chopped deseeded dill pickles
¼ cup finely chopped red onion
½ teaspoon hot pepper sauce (such as Tabasco®)
½ teaspoon dried dill, or to taste
kosher salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil
Add shells and cook, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, about 9 minutes
Rinse with cold water, drain, and set aside
Combine mayonnaise, pickles, onion, lemon juice, mustard, hot sauce, dill weed, salt, and pepper in a large bowl
Stir in the cooled pasta and Cheddar cheese
